description: This eye catching, colourful vegetable salad is a hit at our place.
name: Vegetable Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Roast sweet potato, pumpkin, carrots and red onion together. (Note sweet potatoes and onion were cooked at the same time but appear on the next tray)
Add whole beetroots, wrapped in foil when you turn the vegetables. (I cut it once it's cooked)
Once almost cooked add the capsicum, asparagus, macadamia nuts, tomatoes. These only take about 10 minutes.
Preheat oven for vegetable roasting. All ovens are different so go with how you usually cook vegetables. I did mine with the below cuts on 170 degrees fan forced for approximately 45 minutes.
Cut and wedge vegetables, my pictures are below. Drizzle with olive oil.

To serve, add spinach to a shallow serving dish (I used a pie dish). Layer potato, sweet potato and pumpkin on the bottom, red onion, then your mix of carrots, asparagus, capsicum, macadamia nuts. Add blobs of Persian feta and top with vine tomatoes.
Drizzle over your dressing of choice.
